description:
This week's adventure brings back Marten, first introduced in "Auditions 12" as the muscular stud with sexy eyes and a big dick.
Marten had met Cameron a few weeks ago. They both clicked at the time and later expressed an interest in, well, "playing" together.
Marten told me that he is versatile and I knew Cameron was a total power bottom (even though he could easily be a very well-equipped top!).
I got them together and Marten was really nervous. Fortunately, Cameron was able to put him at ease and it wasn't long before Marten was fucking the shit out of Cameron's sexy little hole...
title: Marten & Cameron
